scripts.prebuild: npm install && (mkdir dist || del /s /q dist) || echo.
scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:editor
scripts.build:main: cd src-main && npm run build && copy dist\index.html ..\dist && copy dist\*.js ..\dist && copy dist\favicon.ico ..\dist
scripts.build:editor: cd src-editor && npm run build && copy dist\index.html ..\dist\editor.html
